pictmeter~.c

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 /**
00002     @file
00003     pictmeter~ - audio meter that works by resizing an image
00004 
00005     @ingroup    examples    
00006 */
00007 
00008 #include "ext.h"                            // standard Max include, always required
00009 #include "ext_obex.h"                       // required for new style Max object
00010 #include "jpatcher_api.h"
00011 #include "jgraphics.h"
00012 #include "z_dsp.h"                          // should be after jpatcher_api.h
00013 #include "ext_drag.h"
00014 
00015 typedef struct _pictmeter 
00016 {
00017     t_pxjbox    p_obj;
00018     t_jsurface *p_surface;
00019     void *p_clock;
00020     double p_value;
00021     double p_max;
00022     char p_startclock;
00023 } t_pictmeter;
00024 
00025 void *pictmeter_new(t_symbol *s, long argc, t_atom *argv);
00026 void pictmeter_free(t_pictmeter *x);
00027 void pictmeter_assist(t_pictmeter *x, void *b, long m, long a, char *s);
00028 void pictmeter_paint(t_pictmeter *x, t_object *patcherview);
00029 void pictmeter_getdrawparams(t_pictmeter *x, t_object *patcherview, t_jboxdrawparams *params);
00030 void pictmeter_read(t_pictmeter *x, t_symbol *s);
00031 void pictmeter_doread(t_pictmeter *x, t_symbol *s, long argc, t_atom *argv);
00032 long pictmeter_acceptsdrag_unlocked(t_pictmeter *x, t_object *drag, t_object *view);
00033 void pictmeter_dsp(t_pictmeter *x, t_signal **sp, short *count);
00034 t_int *pictmeter_perform(t_int *w);
00035 void pictmeter_tick(t_pictmeter *x);
00036 void pictmeter_free(t_pictmeter *x);

00038 
00039 static t_class *s_pictmeter_class;
00040 
00041 int main(void)
00042 {   
00043     t_class *c;
00044         
00045     c = class_new("pictmeter~", (method)pictmeter_new, (method)pictmeter_free, sizeof(t_pictmeter), 0L, A_GIMME, 0);
00046 
00047     c->c_flags |= CLASS_FLAG_NEWDICTIONARY;
00048     jbox_initclass(c, 0);
00049     class_dspinitjbox(c);
00050 
00051     class_addmethod(c, (method)pictmeter_dsp, "dsp", A_CANT, 0);
00052     class_addmethod(c, (method)pictmeter_paint, "paint",    A_CANT, 0);
00053     class_addmethod(c, (method)pictmeter_getdrawparams, "getdrawparams", A_CANT, 0);
00054     class_addmethod(c, (method)pictmeter_assist,            "assist",       A_CANT, 0);  
00055     class_addmethod(c, (method)pictmeter_acceptsdrag_unlocked, "acceptsdrag_unlocked", A_CANT, 0);
00056     class_addmethod(c, (method)pictmeter_acceptsdrag_unlocked, "acceptsdrag_locked", A_CANT, 0);
00057     class_addmethod(c, (method)pictmeter_read, "read", A_DEFSYM, 0);
00058     
00059     CLASS_ATTR_DEFAULT(c,"patching_rect",0, "0. 0. 128. 128.");
00060     
00061     class_register(CLASS_BOX, c);
00062     s_pictmeter_class = c;
00063 
00064     return 0;
00065 }
00066 
00067 void pictmeter_assist(t_pictmeter *x, void *b, long m, long a, char *s)
00068 {
00069     if (m == ASSIST_INLET)  //inlet
00070         sprintf(s, "(signal) Audio Input");
00071 }
00072 
00073 void pictmeter_paint(t_pictmeter *x, t_object *patcherview)
00074 {
00075     t_rect src, dst, rect;
00076     t_jgraphics *g = (t_jgraphics*) patcherview_get_jgraphics(patcherview);     // obtain graphics context
00077     
00078     if (!x->p_surface)
00079         return;
00080     
00081     src.width = jgraphics_image_surface_get_width(x->p_surface);
00082     src.height = jgraphics_image_surface_get_height(x->p_surface);
00083     src.x = 0;
00084     src.y = 0;
00085     jbox_get_rect_for_view((t_object *)x, patcherview, &rect);
00086     dst.width = rect.width * x->p_value;
00087     dst.height = rect.height * x->p_value;
00088     if (dst.width < 1 || dst.height < 1)
00089         return;
00090     dst.x = 0 + ((rect.width * 0.5) - (dst.width * 0.5));
00091     dst.y = 0 + ((rect.height * 0.5) - (dst.height * 0.5));
00092     
00093     jgraphics_image_surface_draw(g, x->p_surface, src, dst);
00094 }
00095 
00096 void pictmeter_getdrawparams(t_pictmeter *x, t_object *patcherview, t_jboxdrawparams *params)
00097 {
00098     params->d_bordercolor.alpha = 0;
00099     params->d_boxfillcolor.alpha = 0;
00100 }
00101 
00102 void pictmeter_read(t_pictmeter *x, t_symbol *s)
00103 {
00104     defer((t_object *)x, (method)pictmeter_doread, s, 0, NULL);
00105 }
00106 
00107 void pictmeter_doread(t_pictmeter *x, t_symbol *s, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00108 {
00109     char filename[MAX_PATH_CHARS];
00110     long *type,ntype,outtype;
00111     t_max_err err;
00112     char alloc;
00113     short path;
00114     t_jsurface *surface;
00115     
00116     jgraphics_getfiletypes(x, &ntype, &type, &alloc);
00117     if (s == gensym("")) {
00118         err = open_dialog(filename, &path,(void *)&outtype, (void *)type, ntype);
00119         if (err)
00120             return;
00121     } else {        
00122         strcpy(filename,s->s_name);
00123         err = locatefile_extended(filename, &path, &outtype, type, ntype);
00124         if (err)
00125             return;
00126     }
00127     surface = jgraphics_image_surface_create_referenced(filename, path); 
00128     if (surface)
00129         x->p_surface = surface;
00130     if (alloc)
00131         sysmem_freeptr((char *)type);
00132 }
00133 
00134 long pictmeter_acceptsdrag_unlocked(t_pictmeter *x, t_object *drag, t_object *view)
00135 {
00136     if (jdrag_matchdragrole(drag, gensym("imagefile"), 0)) {
00137         jdrag_box_add(drag, (t_object *)x, gensym("read"));
00138         return true;
00139     }
00140     return false;
00141 }
00142 
00143 void pictmeter_dsp(t_pictmeter *x, t_signal **sp, short *count)
00144 {
00145     x->p_value = 0.;
00146     x->p_max = 0.;
00147     // only put perf func on dsp chain if sig is connected
00148     if (count[0]) {
00149         dsp_add(pictmeter_perform, 3, x, sp[0]->s_vec, sp[0]->s_n);
00150         x->p_startclock = true;
00151     }
00152 }
00153 
00154 t_int *pictmeter_perform(t_int *w)
00155 {
00156     t_pictmeter *x = (t_pictmeter *)(w[1]);
00157     t_float *in = (t_float *)(w[2]);
00158     int n = (int)(w[3]);
00159     double xn, max;
00160         
00161     if (x->p_obj.z_disabled)
00162         goto out;
00163         
00164     max = x->p_max;
00165     
00166     while (n--) {
00167         xn = *in++;
00168         if (xn < 0)
00169             xn = -xn;
00170         if (xn > max)
00171             max = xn;
00172     }
00173     if (max > 1.)
00174         max = 1.;
00175     x->p_max = max;
00176         
00177     if (x->p_startclock) {
00178         x->p_startclock = 0;
00179         clock_delay(x->p_clock,0);
00180     }
00181 out:
00182     return w + 4;
00183 }
00184 
00185 void pictmeter_tick(t_pictmeter *x)
00186 {
00187     if (x->p_value != x->p_max) {
00188         x->p_value = x->p_max;
00189         x->p_max = 0;
00190         jbox_redraw((t_jbox *)x);
00191     }
00192     
00193     if (sys_getdspstate())
00194         clock_fdelay(x->p_clock, 150);
00195 }
00196 
00197 void pictmeter_free(t_pictmeter *x)
00198 {
00199     dsp_freejbox((t_pxjbox *)x);
00200     freeobject((t_object *)x->p_clock);
00201     jbox_free((t_jbox *)x);
00202 }
00203 
00204 void *pictmeter_new(t_symbol *s, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00205 {
00206     t_pictmeter *x = NULL;
00207     t_dictionary *d=NULL;
00208     long boxflags;
00209     
00210     if (!(d=object_dictionaryarg(argc,argv)))
00211         return NULL;
00212    
00213     x = (t_pictmeter *)object_alloc(s_pictmeter_class);
00214     boxflags = 0 
00215             | JBOX_DRAWFIRSTIN 
00216             | JBOX_NODRAWBOX
00217             | JBOX_DRAWINLAST
00218             | JBOX_TRANSPARENT  
00219     //      | JBOX_NOGROW
00220     //      | JBOX_GROWY
00221             | JBOX_GROWBOTH
00222     //      | JBOX_HILITE
00223     //      | JBOX_BACKGROUND
00224             | JBOX_DRAWBACKGROUND
00225     //      | JBOX_NOFLOATINSPECTOR
00226     //      | JBOX_TEXTFIELD
00227     //      | JBOX_MOUSEDRAGDELTA
00228     //      | JBOX_TEXTFIELD
00229             ;
00230 
00231     jbox_new((t_jbox *)x, boxflags, argc, argv);
00232     x->p_obj.z_box.b_firstin = (void *)x;
00233     dsp_setupjbox((t_pxjbox *)x,1);
00234     x->p_clock = clock_new(x,(method)pictmeter_tick);
00235     x->p_value = x->p_max = 0;
00236     x->p_startclock = false;
00237     jbox_ready((t_jbox *)x);
00238     return x;
00239 }
